title: Search Advertising Aggregated Performance Measures By Ad
description: Search Advertising Aggregated Performance Measures By Ad is a collection of aggregated measures pulled from Search Advertising Platforms by Ad/Keyword.

xdm:accountId.title: Account Identifier
xdm:accountId.description: Identifier that defines Customer/Client ID setup on the Search Advertising Platform.

xdm:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
xdm:campaignId.description: Campaign ID on the search advertising platform..

xdm:adgroupId.title: Ad Group Identifier
xdm:adgroupId.description: Ad Group ID on the search advertising platform.

xdm:adId.title: Ad Identifier
xdm:adId.description: Ad ID on the search advertising platform.

xdm:searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
xdm:searchEngineId.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name.

xdm:clicks.description: Count of Clicks for a given ad displayed on the network.

xdm:impressions.description: Count of impressions for a given ad displayed on the network.

xdm:totalCost.description: Total Advertising Spend for a given ad displayed on the network. The spend is in the account currency configured on the network.

xdm:avgPosition.description: Average Position of the Ad displayed on the network.

xdm:topPageBid.description: Top of the Page Bid Estimator. The measure is computed by the network and is not an additive measure.

xdm:qualityScore.description: Quality Score of the Keyword assigned by the network - range 1 to 10. This is not an additive measure.

xdm:device.title: Device
xdm:device.description: The device from where the ad was displayed.
